channel.title: Major help plz
channel.description:
ok i need a step by step way to get my scar and scripts working i tried the sticky but didnt get it very well so plz dont post that link... plz post how you got it to work like where you put the stuff and all that and idk what compile the folder is so explain that to me too plz lol
plz help i have plans for a santa and full drag plz![br][size=1]Posted at: August 29, 2006, 10:21:38 PM[/size][hr]im gonna get off for a lil while because ive been on like ALL DAY
doesnt mean dont post ill check very soon

item.title: Major help plz

item.title: Major help plz
item.dc:creator: @jonkilla jonkilla
item.description:
@jonkilla wrote:

[quote=“junior, post:4, topic:11695”]hmm,
you have to download the latest version of SCAR,
download all the includes,
download the latest SRL.
thats really all you need… and then a working script to paste inside the box so you can auto…[/quote]

yea but i need a step by step that i can understand at age 12 :\ starblaster’s version is hard for me.like idk where everything goes and stuff so plz help

Read full topic
